dcterms:creator: Yang Deng
Wenqiang Lei
Wenxuan Zhang
Wai Lam
Tat-Seng Chua
dcterms:description: PACIFIC is a new dataset designed for proactive conversational question answering (PCQA) over hybrid contexts of tabular and textual data in finance. It includes features such as proactive assistance in clarifying user queries, numerical reasoning, and a combination of table and text contexts.
dcterms:title: PACIFIC

dcterms:creator: Fengbin Zhu
Wenqiang Lei
Youcheng Huang
Chao Wang
Shuo Zhang
Jiancheng Lv
Fuli Feng
Tat-Seng Chua
dcterms:description: TAT-QA is a question answering benchmark that focuses on a hybrid of tabular and textual content in finance, providing a set of question-answer pairs for evaluating financial QA systems.
dcterms:title: TAT-QA

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Aliannejadi
Julia Kiseleva
Aleksandr Chuklin
Jeff Dalton
Mikhail S. Burtsev
dcterms:description: ClariQ is a dataset designed for building and evaluating open-domain dialogue corpora that include clarifying questions, facilitating research in conversational question answering.
dcterms:title: ClariQ

dcterms:creator: Meiqi Guo
Mingda Zhang
Siva Reddy
Malihe Alikhani
dcterms:description: Abg-CoQA is a dataset aimed at clarifying ambiguity in conversational question answering, focusing on generating clarifying questions to improve understanding in dialogues.
dcterms:title: Abg-CoQA

dcterms:creator: Zhiyu Chen
Wenhu Chen
Charese Smiley
Sameena Shah
Iana Borova
Dylan Langdon

Matt Beane
Ting-Hao Huang
Bryan R. Routledge
William Yang Wang
dcterms:description: FinQA is a dataset focused on numerical reasoning over financial data, providing a benchmark for evaluating models that perform numerical calculations in financial contexts.
dcterms:title: FinQA

dcterms:creator: Dheeru Dua
Yizhong Wang
Pradeep Dasigi
Gabriel Stanovsky
Sameer Singh
Matt Gardner
dcterms:description: DROP is a reading comprehension benchmark that requires discrete reasoning over paragraphs, designed to evaluate models on their ability to perform reasoning tasks.
dcterms:title: DROP

dcterms:creator: Yang Deng
Wenxuan Zhang
Weiwen Xu
Wenqiang Lei
Tat-Seng Chua
Wai Lam
dcterms:description: MMConvQA is a unified multi-task learning framework for multi-goal conversational recommender systems, integrating various tasks into a single model.
dcterms:title: MMConvQA

dcterms:creator: Kai Nakamura
Sharon Levy
Yi-Lin Tuan
Wenhu Chen
William Yang Wang
dcterms:description: HybriDialogue is an information-seeking dialogue dataset grounded on tabular and textual data, designed to facilitate research in hybrid dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: HybriDialogue
